Html:
Do any of the changesets have logic that will allow you to enter a recurring event? So every Tuesday I won't have to enter an event (for instance) that happens throughout the summer.

It would be very useful I think. I've tried to search but if someone knows off-hand (Zach?) it would be much appreciated.

:-)
Thanks!
Yes, the latest changesets (starting with Changeset 3495) has the reocurring events logic. It should be on the ~/events/addreoc.aspx page.
Cool. Thank you, sir. I'll download a fresh copy and check it out.
